name: PoundKilo
0:
”Alexa launch Pound Kilo”
”Alexa ask Pound Kilo how much is 15 pound”
”convert 15 pound to kilo”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pound kilo
des:
Quickly convert Pounds to Kilos. You can simply ask "Alexa ask Pound Kilo how much is the 15 pound". 
You can also launch the skill "Pound Kilo" and can ask "Convert 15 pounds to kilo" or "How much is 15 pounds".
It does 2 decimal point precision.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
